00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "KviHeapObject.h"
00029 #include "KviCString.h"
00030 #include "KviPointerList.h"
00031 
00032 #include <QRect>
00033 #include <QPoint>
00034 #include <QSize>
00035 
00036 class KVILIB_API KviParameterList : public KviPointerList<KviCString>, public KviHeapObject
00037 {
00038 public:
00039         KviParameterList();
00040         KviParameterList(KviCString *p1);
00041         KviParameterList(KviCString *p1,KviCString *p2);
00042         KviParameterList(KviCString *p1,KviCString *p2,KviCString *p3);
00043         KviParameterList(KviCString *p1,KviCString *p2,KviCString *p3,KviCString *p4);
00044         KviParameterList(KviCString *p1,KviCString *p2,KviCString *p3,KviCString *p4,KviCString *p5);
00045         KviParameterList(KviCString *p1,KviCString *p2,KviCString *p3,KviCString *p4,KviCString *p5,KviCString *p6);
00046         KviParameterList(KviCString *p1,KviCString *p2,KviCString *p3,KviCString *p4,KviCString *p5,KviCString *p6,KviCString *p7);
00047         KviParameterList(const char * paramBuffer);
00048         virtual ~KviParameterList();
00049 private:
00050         KviCString m_szEmpty;
00051 public:
00052         void         init(){ (void)first(); };
00053         // These functions have to be called when the
00054         // current() points to the FIRST item that has
00055         // to be interpreted as Bool,Int,UInt,Rect etc...
00056         // At the call exit the current() points
00057         // to the first item that was NOT used by the call
00058         bool         getBool();
00059         int          getInt(bool * bOk = 0);
00060         unsigned int getUInt(bool * bOk = 0);
00061         QRect        getRect(bool * bOk = 0);
00062         QPoint       getPoint(bool * bOk = 0);
00063         QSize        getSize(bool * bOk = 0);
00064         KviCString *     safeFirst();
00065         KviCString *     safeNext();
00066         const char * safeFirstParam(){ return safeFirst()->ptr(); };
00067         const char * safeNextParam(){ return safeNext()->ptr(); };
00068 
00069 };
